short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Camelot is a Layer3 protocol which based on Merlin and dedicated to DePIN.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the AI revolution effortlessly with Camelot!

This innovative web application operates discreetly in the background of your computer, utilizing minimal amounts of idle bandwidth to access AI training data online. It does not have access to any personal information or browsing history; instead, it gathers data from public websites to sell to AI companies, all while rewarding you for your contribution.

Camelot only utilizes a fraction of your unused internet capacity, ensuring that your browsing speed and quality remain unaffected. Simply download the app, sign up, and start earning rewards effortlessly.

Key Highlights:

1. Optimal Resource Utilization: Maximize your idle internet capacity with Camelot, guaranteeing no impact on your browsing experience.

2. Earn While Browsing: Accumulate Camelot Points as you surf the web and share resources, unlocking a range of exclusive rewards.

3. User-Friendly Interface: Activate Camelot, track your points, and customize your settings with ease through a simple interface.

4. Secure and Transparent: We prioritize user privacy and security. Camelot does not access personal data and provides transparent visibility into its resource usage.

Unleash the potential of your unused internet capacity today by installing Camelot. For any queries or assistance, refer to our FAQ or reach out to our support team. Camelot - where every sharing moment is rewarding.
